translations: v.召唤；召集（会议）；传唤，传讯（出庭）；迫切地要求（帮助）；鼓起（勇气），振作（精神）

sentences.sentence: She was trying to summon up the courage to leave him.
sentences.translation: 当时她试图鼓起勇气离开他。

sentences.sentence: I punched the button to summon the elevator.
I couldn't even summon the energy to get out of bed.
sentences.translation: 我甚至连下床的力气都没有。
